shared.facades

Class ResourcesFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.facades.AbstractFacade
      • shared.facades.ResourcesFacade

  • public class ResourcesFacade
extends AbstractFacade
    Provides operations for users to manipulate their resources.

      • purchaseItem

        public void purchaseItem(@NotNull
                         Player player,
                         @NotNull
                         PurchaseType item)
        Deduct the resources required to purchase a request item for a player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to deduct from, not null
        item - the item to purchase, not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the preconditions are not met.
        Precondition:
        canPurchaseItem(Player, PurchaseType) returns true
        Postcondition:
        The player will have the cost of item deducted from their resources., The game's bank of resources will be updated accordingly.

        Precondition:

        Postcondition:

        Postcondition:

      • getAwardsFromHexes

        public java.util.Map<PlayerIndex,ResourceSet> getAwardsFromHexes(int roll)
        Determine the award all players would receive from a given roll based on the hexes they have settlements or cities on.

        • All settlements award 1 of a hex's resource.
        • All cities award 2 of a hex's resource.
        • If there is not enough of a given resource in the bank to fulfill everyone's production, then no one can receive any of the offending resource.
        • If a hex is of the desert or water type or has the robber, it will not award anything.

        The map returned describes what each player's would earn from their settlements/cities. The null key of the map returned will contain all resources that would not be awarded.

        Parameters:
        roll - the number rolled by the die, in range [1-6],[8-12].
        Returns:
        a map from player to the resources awarded, null key is rejected resources

      • canGiveAwards

        public boolean canGiveAwards(java.util.Map<PlayerIndex,ResourceSet> awards)
        Whether the specified awards (returned from getAwardsFromHexes(int).
        Parameters:
        awards - the awards to check
        Returns:
        true if the awards could be given; false otherwise
